description: Episode of Series "International zone" President of Tanzania, Julius Nyerere, the guide in this film, explains his country's determination to seek a single citizenship for all its people, to overcome problems of hunger, poverty and ignorance without putting the country in debt to outside exploiters, and to build new systems of cooperation at all levels.
